bioconda.name: mreps
bioconda.summary: mreps is a flexible and efficient software for identifying serial repeats (usually called tandem repeats) in DNA sequences.

biocontainers.name: mreps
biocontainers.summary: Mreps is a flexible and efficient software for identifying serial repeats (usually called tandem repeats) in DNA sequences.

biotools.summary: mreps is a tool for identifing tandemn repeats in DNA sequences.

bioschemas.name: mreps
bioschemas.summary: mreps is a tool for identifing tandemn repeats in DNA sequences.
